mapper.select: SELECT c.`id`,c.`company_name`,c.`company_address`,c.`type_ownership`, c.main_business,c.`strategic_focus`,c.`licence_no`,c.`production`, c.`ten_shareholders`,(SELECT `con_name` FROM z_actual_controller WHERE id=c.`introduction_controller_id`) AS user_name,c.`company_ranking`, c.`business_license`,c.`exequatur` FROM company c

SELECT c.`id`,c.`company_name`,c.`company_address`,c.`type_ownership`, c.main_business,c.`strategic_focus`,c.`licence_no`,c.`production`, c.`ten_shareholders`,(SELECT `con_name` FROM z_actual_controller WHERE id=c.`introduction_controller_id`) AS user_name,c.`company_ranking`, c.`business_license`,c.`exequatur` FROM company c
and c.company_name like CONCAT ('%',#{company_name},'%')
ORDER BY c.`company_ranking`

SELECT c.`id`,c.`company_name`,c.`company_address`,c.`type_ownership`, c.main_business,c.`strategic_focus`,c.`licence_no`,c.`production`, c.`ten_shareholders`,c.listed_unlisted,(SELECT `con_name` FROM z_actual_controller WHERE id=c.`introduction_controller_id`) AS user_name,c.`company_ranking`, c.`business_license`,c.`exequatur` FROM company c
